entry.title: Getting Around Gotham, or: Five Drabble Trysts with Batfam Men, and One 3300 Word Epilogue About How You All Figured That Out
entry.summary:
Author: gone (relocation)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 100Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 4

Summary: A new arrival alone in Gotham, you make a point of meeting new people and new potential hookups. Little did you know that all your potential dates knew each other. You find yourself entangled with five different men, unaware that they are all connected, as are they, until you all end up at one party. (In your defence, they all had different surnames.) - Inspired by every time I've thought "What if someone dated everyone in the Batfam, and never realized it because they all have different surnames?"- Written for the characters in general, most recently influenced by WFA- Only Jason got outright smut, sorry Dick et al.- Drabbles can pretty much be enjoyed separately, but they are meant to be read together with the longer epilogue.
